content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262852,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか、ポピンズの雰囲気ネタ、短め","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, the Poppins atmosphere gag should be brief."},{"lineNumber":262853,"originalJapaneseLine":"割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short."},{"lineNumber":262854,"originalJapaneseLine":"１部用のアレキサンダーはありません、バーナード視点で","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no Alexander for part 1; this is from Bernard's perspective."},{"lineNumber":262855,"originalJapaneseLine":"バーナードのカードを取得している時発生","translatedEnglishLine":"Occurs when obtaining Bernard's card."},{"lineNumber":262856,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262857,"originalJapaneseLine":"酒場、いつものバーナードのり、一人で酒を飲んでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"At the tavern, the usual Bernard vibe, drinking alone."},{"lineNumber":262858,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界を守る大事な戦いに友を誘いにいった","translatedEnglishLine":"I went to invite a friend to an important battle to protect this world."},{"lineNumber":262859,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴の良そうな場所は何カ所かまわった、家にもいったさ","translatedEnglishLine":"I went around several places where he might be, even to his home."},{"lineNumber":262860,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、奴はどこにもいなかった、近所の人の噂では、半年も前から修業に出て戻ってこないとか","translatedEnglishLine":"But he was nowhere to be found; neighbors rumored he left for training six months ago and hasn't returned."},{"lineNumber":262861,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦争に巻き込まれ魔軍に殺されたとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Some say he got caught up in this war and was killed by the demon army..."},{"lineNumber":262862,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、あの男が殺される訳がない、奴はどこかで生きている","translatedEnglishLine":"No, there's no way that man was killed; he's alive somewhere."},{"lineNumber":262863,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦いを続けていたら、またあえるさ、アレキサンダー、我が相棒・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If this battle continues, we'll meet again, Alexander, my partner..."},{"lineNumber":262864,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな、自分に酔いしれるノリでアレキサンダーの様子を語る","translatedEnglishLine":"Speaking of Alexander with a self-indulgent tone."},{"lineNumber":262865,"originalJapaneseLine":"割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short."},{"lineNumber":262866,"originalJapaneseLine":"リクチェルは２部のキャラですが、歳を取ってないので出してもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Rikchel is a character from part 2, but since she hasn't aged, maybe it's okay to include her."},{"lineNumber":262867,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262868,"originalJapaneseLine":"任せます","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll leave it to you."},{"lineNumber":262869,"originalJapaneseLine":"１部のこの時期、リクチェルがどうしていたかという感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Just a sense of how Rikchel was during this period of part 1."},{"lineNumber":262870,"originalJapaneseLine":"名前を隠しておきたい場合は、名を消していてもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to hide the name, it's fine to erase it."},{"lineNumber":262871,"originalJapaneseLine":"割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short."},{"lineNumber":262872,"originalJapaneseLine":"ますぞえと会ってない時","translatedEnglishLine":"When not meeting with Masuzoe."},{"lineNumber":262873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262874,"originalJapaneseLine":"地下のどこか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhere underground..."},{"lineNumber":262875,"originalJapaneseLine":"ますぞえとハニ子、地上では大戦だよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Masuzoe and Haniko, there's a great war above ground."},{"lineNumber":262876,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスから参加するようにと手紙が来ているよ","translatedEnglishLine":"A letter has come saying to join from Cavebris."},{"lineNumber":262877,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ早い、本気を出す時期ではないとか・・いつもの引きこもりノリ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's still early; it's not time to get serious yet... the usual recluse vibe."},{"lineNumber":262878,"originalJapaneseLine":"割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short."},{"lineNumber":262879,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブリティシュとあってない時","translatedEnglishLine":"When not meeting with British."},{"lineNumber":262880,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262881,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城付近の洞窟","translatedEnglishLine":"A cave near Lezas Castle."},{"lineNumber":262882,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに何年、いや何十年、何百年も石の中に閉じ込められた男がいる","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a man who has been trapped inside stone for years, no, decades, no, hundreds of years."},{"lineNumber":262883,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼の名はブリティシュ、遙か昔の大英雄","translatedEnglishLine":"His name is British, a great hero from long ago."},{"lineNumber":262884,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーか、子供とかが現れる。あっ・・なにかいると近寄ってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Honey or children appear. Ah... something is there, they approach it."},{"lineNumber":262885,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブリティシュが助けてくれ、とか腹へったとか声をかけると","translatedEnglishLine":"When British calls out 'Help me' or 'I'm hungry',"},{"lineNumber":262886,"originalJapaneseLine":"きもーとかいって立ち去ってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"They say 'Gross' and walk away."},{"lineNumber":262887,"originalJapaneseLine":"しくしく、はぁ・・暇だなぁ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Sniffle, sigh... I'm so bored..."},{"lineNumber":262888,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、ランスの元に諜報活動が得意なメンバーが集められた","translatedEnglishLine":"At Rance Castle, members skilled in intelligence gathering have gathered before Rance."},{"lineNumber":262889,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみ　条件無しでいます","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami is present without conditions."},{"lineNumber":262890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スー、フレイア、闇鷺、ウルザ、カオル、クレイン、オルオレ、キャロリ　こちらはＩＦで確認","translatedEnglishLine":"Su, Freia, Yamisagi, Urza, Kaoru, Crane, Olore, Caroli – these are confirmed via IF."},{"lineNumber":262891,"originalJapaneseLine":"各自に特別に任務を与えれる、俺の指示通りに行え。","translatedEnglishLine":"Special missions are given individually; act according to my orders."},{"lineNumber":262892,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひとりずつ、こそこそランスが耳打ち　うわっ、ひどっ、よくそんな事を・・とか","translatedEnglishLine":"One by one, Rance whispers secretly things like 'ugh, that's terrible, how could you...'"},{"lineNumber":262893,"originalJapaneseLine":"内容は特に書かずに、ランスがえぐいプランを指示したという感じで、全員分でなくていいです。","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to write details; just the feeling that Rance gave a brutal plan. It doesn't have to cover everyone."},{"lineNumber":262894,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみだけでもオーケ","translatedEnglishLine":"Just Kanami is fine."},{"lineNumber":262895,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはどうするのよ","translatedEnglishLine":"What will Rance do?"},{"lineNumber":262896,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は、休憩だ。すでにがんばったから今は御褒美タイムなのだ。さて誰を呼ぼうかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm taking a break. I've already worked hard, so now it's reward time. Now, who should I call?"},{"lineNumber":262897,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前らははたらけー","translatedEnglishLine":"You all get to work!"},{"lineNumber":262898,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262899,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262900,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日、魔軍の各地で混乱が発生","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day, confusion erupts across the demon army's territories."},{"lineNumber":262901,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスのエグい計画で魔軍の戦力が大幅に下がった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Rance's brutal plan, the demon army's strength was greatly reduced."},{"lineNumber":262902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　（　難易度　−１　）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Difficulty −1)"},{"lineNumber":262903,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸＸＸ地域のとある戦場、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"A certain battlefield in the XXXX region, night."},{"lineNumber":262904,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance."},{"lineNumber":262905,"originalJapaneseLine":"香、ロッキー　条件無しでいます","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaori, Rocky, present without conditions."},{"lineNumber":262906,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てる、サチコ、カロリア、パットン、コルドバ、BS、勝子　ＩＦで確認","translatedEnglishLine":"Teru, Sachiko, Karoria, Patton, Cordoba, BS, Katsuiko – confirmed via IF."},{"lineNumber":262907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262908,"originalJapaneseLine":"なぜだー、今は拠点フェイズ、女の子としっぽり楽しむ","translatedEnglishLine":"Why?! It's the base phase now, time to quietly enjoy with the girls."},{"lineNumber":262909,"originalJapaneseLine":"休憩タイムだろがー","translatedEnglishLine":"It's break time!"},{"lineNumber":262910,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないですよ、この地で魔軍の奇襲作戦があるという情報を手に入れたものの","translatedEnglishLine":"It can't be helped; although we got information about a demon army surprise attack in this area,"},{"lineNumber":262911,"originalJapaneseLine":"現地軍と連絡が取れずに、すぐに動けるのはランス様の魔人討伐隊しかなかったのですから","translatedEnglishLine":"We couldn't contact the local forces, so the only ones who could move immediately were Rance-sama's demon extermination squad."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか、ポピンズの雰囲気ネタ、短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, the Poppins atmosphere gag should be brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １部用のアレキサンダーはありません、バーナード視点で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no Alexander for part 1; this is from Bernard's perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バーナードのカードを取得している時発生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Occurs when obtaining Bernard's card.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場、いつものバーナードのり、一人で酒を飲んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the tavern, the usual Bernard vibe, drinking alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界を守る大事な戦いに友を誘いにいった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I went to invite a friend to an important battle to protect this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴の良そうな場所は何カ所かまわった、家にもいったさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I went around several places where he might be, even to his home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、奴はどこにもいなかった、近所の人の噂では、半年も前から修業に出て戻ってこないとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he was nowhere to be found; neighbors rumored he left for training six months ago and hasn't returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦争に巻き込まれ魔軍に殺されたとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some say he got caught up in this war and was killed by the demon army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、あの男が殺される訳がない、奴はどこかで生きている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, there's no way that man was killed; he's alive somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いを続けていたら、またあえるさ、アレキサンダー、我が相棒・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this battle continues, we'll meet again, Alexander, my partner...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな、自分に酔いしれるノリでアレキサンダーの様子を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Speaking of Alexander with a self-indulgent tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェルは２部のキャラですが、歳を取ってないので出してもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rikchel is a character from part 2, but since she hasn't aged, maybe it's okay to include her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave it to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １部のこの時期、リクチェルがどうしていたかという感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a sense of how Rikchel was during this period of part 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名前を隠しておきたい場合は、名を消していてもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to hide the name, it's fine to erase it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえと会ってない時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When not meeting with Masuzoe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下のどこか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere underground...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえとハニ子、地上では大戦だよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masuzoe and Haniko, there's a great war above ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスから参加するようにと手紙が来ているよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A letter has come saying to join from Cavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ早い、本気を出す時期ではないとか・・いつもの引きこもりノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's still early; it's not time to get serious yet... the usual recluse vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブリティシュとあってない時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When not meeting with British.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城付近の洞窟
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A cave near Lezas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに何年、いや何十年、何百年も石の中に閉じ込められた男がいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a man who has been trapped inside stone for years, no, decades, no, hundreds of years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼の名はブリティシュ、遙か昔の大英雄
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His name is British, a great hero from long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーか、子供とかが現れる。あっ・・なにかいると近寄ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honey or children appear. Ah... something is there, they approach it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブリティシュが助けてくれ、とか腹へったとか声をかけると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When British calls out 'Help me' or 'I'm hungry',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きもーとかいって立ち去ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say 'Gross' and walk away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しくしく、はぁ・・暇だなぁ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sniffle, sigh... I'm so bored...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、ランスの元に諜報活動が得意なメンバーが集められた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, members skilled in intelligence gathering have gathered before Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ　条件無しでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami is present without conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スー、フレイア、闇鷺、ウルザ、カオル、クレイン、オルオレ、キャロリ　こちらはＩＦで確認
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Su, Freia, Yamisagi, Urza, Kaoru, Crane, Olore, Caroli – these are confirmed via IF.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各自に特別に任務を与えれる、俺の指示通りに行え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Special missions are given individually; act according to my orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとりずつ、こそこそランスが耳打ち　うわっ、ひどっ、よくそんな事を・・とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One by one, Rance whispers secretly things like 'ugh, that's terrible, how could you...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容は特に書かずに、ランスがえぐいプランを指示したという感じで、全員分でなくていいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to write details; just the feeling that Rance gave a brutal plan. It doesn't have to cover everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみだけでもオーケ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just Kanami is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはどうするのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will Rance do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は、休憩だ。すでにがんばったから今は御褒美タイムなのだ。さて誰を呼ぼうかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm taking a break. I've already worked hard, so now it's reward time. Now, who should I call?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前らははたらけー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all get to work!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、魔軍の各地で混乱が発生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, confusion erupts across the demon army's territories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスのエグい計画で魔軍の戦力が大幅に下がった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Rance's brutal plan, the demon army's strength was greatly reduced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　難易度　−１　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Difficulty −1)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸＸ地域のとある戦場、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A certain battlefield in the XXXX region, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香、ロッキー　条件無しでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaori, Rocky, present without conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てる、サチコ、カロリア、パットン、コルドバ、BS、勝子　ＩＦで確認
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru, Sachiko, Karoria, Patton, Cordoba, BS, Katsuiko – confirmed via IF.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なぜだー、今は拠点フェイズ、女の子としっぽり楽しむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why?! It's the base phase now, time to quietly enjoy with the girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩タイムだろがー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's break time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないですよ、この地で魔軍の奇襲作戦があるという情報を手に入れたものの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped; although we got information about a demon army surprise attack in this area,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現地軍と連絡が取れずに、すぐに動けるのはランス様の魔人討伐隊しかなかったのですから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We couldn't contact the local forces, so the only ones who could move immediately were Rance-sama's demon extermination squad.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか、ポピンズの雰囲気ネタ、短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, the Poppins atmosphere gag should be brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １部用のアレキサンダーはありません、バーナード視点で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no Alexander for part 1; this is from Bernard's perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バーナードのカードを取得している時発生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Occurs when obtaining Bernard's card.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場、いつものバーナードのり、一人で酒を飲んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the tavern, the usual Bernard vibe, drinking alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界を守る大事な戦いに友を誘いにいった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I went to invite a friend to an important battle to protect this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴の良そうな場所は何カ所かまわった、家にもいったさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I went around several places where he might be, even to his home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、奴はどこにもいなかった、近所の人の噂では、半年も前から修業に出て戻ってこないとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he was nowhere to be found; neighbors rumored he left for training six months ago and hasn't returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦争に巻き込まれ魔軍に殺されたとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some say he got caught up in this war and was killed by the demon army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、あの男が殺される訳がない、奴はどこかで生きている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, there's no way that man was killed; he's alive somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いを続けていたら、またあえるさ、アレキサンダー、我が相棒・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this battle continues, we'll meet again, Alexander, my partner...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな、自分に酔いしれるノリでアレキサンダーの様子を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Speaking of Alexander with a self-indulgent tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェルは２部のキャラですが、歳を取ってないので出してもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rikchel is a character from part 2, but since she hasn't aged, maybe it's okay to include her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave it to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １部のこの時期、リクチェルがどうしていたかという感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a sense of how Rikchel was during this period of part 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名前を隠しておきたい場合は、名を消していてもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to hide the name, it's fine to erase it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえと会ってない時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When not meeting with Masuzoe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下のどこか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere underground...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえとハニ子、地上では大戦だよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masuzoe and Haniko, there's a great war above ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスから参加するようにと手紙が来ているよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A letter has come saying to join from Cavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ早い、本気を出す時期ではないとか・・いつもの引きこもりノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's still early; it's not time to get serious yet... the usual recluse vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's an added interjection event, it can be short.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブリティシュとあってない時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When not meeting with British.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城付近の洞窟
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A cave near Lezas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに何年、いや何十年、何百年も石の中に閉じ込められた男がいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a man who has been trapped inside stone for years, no, decades, no, hundreds of years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼の名はブリティシュ、遙か昔の大英雄
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His name is British, a great hero from long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーか、子供とかが現れる。あっ・・なにかいると近寄ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honey or children appear. Ah... something is there, they approach it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブリティシュが助けてくれ、とか腹へったとか声をかけると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When British calls out 'Help me' or 'I'm hungry',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きもーとかいって立ち去ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say 'Gross' and walk away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しくしく、はぁ・・暇だなぁ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sniffle, sigh... I'm so bored...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、ランスの元に諜報活動が得意なメンバーが集められた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, members skilled in intelligence gathering have gathered before Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ　条件無しでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami is present without conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スー、フレイア、闇鷺、ウルザ、カオル、クレイン、オルオレ、キャロリ　こちらはＩＦで確認
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Su, Freia, Yamisagi, Urza, Kaoru, Crane, Olore, Caroli – these are confirmed via IF.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各自に特別に任務を与えれる、俺の指示通りに行え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Special missions are given individually; act according to my orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとりずつ、こそこそランスが耳打ち　うわっ、ひどっ、よくそんな事を・・とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One by one, Rance whispers secretly things like 'ugh, that's terrible, how could you...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容は特に書かずに、ランスがえぐいプランを指示したという感じで、全員分でなくていいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to write details; just the feeling that Rance gave a brutal plan. It doesn't have to cover everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみだけでもオーケ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just Kanami is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはどうするのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will Rance do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は、休憩だ。すでにがんばったから今は御褒美タイムなのだ。さて誰を呼ぼうかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm taking a break. I've already worked hard, so now it's reward time. Now, who should I call?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前らははたらけー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all get to work!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、魔軍の各地で混乱が発生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, confusion erupts across the demon army's territories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスのエグい計画で魔軍の戦力が大幅に下がった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Rance's brutal plan, the demon army's strength was greatly reduced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　難易度　−１　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Difficulty −1)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸＸ地域のとある戦場、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A certain battlefield in the XXXX region, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香、ロッキー　条件無しでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaori, Rocky, present without conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てる、サチコ、カロリア、パットン、コルドバ、BS、勝子　ＩＦで確認
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru, Sachiko, Karoria, Patton, Cordoba, BS, Katsuiko – confirmed via IF.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なぜだー、今は拠点フェイズ、女の子としっぽり楽しむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why?! It's the base phase now, time to quietly enjoy with the girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩タイムだろがー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's break time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないですよ、この地で魔軍の奇襲作戦があるという情報を手に入れたものの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped; although we got information about a demon army surprise attack in this area,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現地軍と連絡が取れずに、すぐに動けるのはランス様の魔人討伐隊しかなかったのですから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We couldn't contact the local forces, so the only ones who could move immediately were Rance-sama's demon extermination squad.
